subject: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we accepted your appication
body:
Your credit score does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this tender will expire TODAY):
$444,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill out this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://swimaunland.com/
